aiEthics.title: AI Ethics & Responsible Use
aiEthics.subtitle: This system follows Thailand AI Ethics Guidelines to ensure responsible and ethical use of AI technology

humanDecision.title: Human Decision Authority
humanDecision.intro: AI provides analysis support only. All final decisions must be made by qualified personnel. Users are solely responsible for:
responsibilities: Making final diagnostic or operational decisions

principles.title: Human-Centric AI
principles.description: The system is designed to augment human expertise, not replace it. All AI outputs require human validation and oversight by qualified laboratory personnel.

principles.title: Transparency & Explainability
principles.description: The system provides detailed analysis results, confidence scores, and annotated images to enable users to understand and verify AI decisions.

principles.title: Fairness & Non-Discrimination
principles.description: The AI model is trained on diverse datasets and regularly validated to ensure consistent, unbiased analysis across different sample types and conditions.

principles.title: Privacy & Data Protection
principles.description: All data is processed securely with role-based access control. Personal and sensitive information is protected in compliance with data protection regulations.

principles.title: Accountability & Responsibility
principles.description: Complete audit trails are maintained for all analyses. Users and organizations remain accountable for all decisions made using this system.

bestPractices.title: Best Practices for Responsible AI Use
items: Always verify AI results with manual inspection
Report any unexpected or anomalous results
Maintain professional skepticism of AI outputs
Follow standard laboratory quality control procedures
Keep abreast of system updates and limitations

reference.text: Thailand AI Ethics Guidelines developed by the National Science and Technology Development Agency (NSTDA) and Digital Economy Promotion Agency (DEPA), Ministry of Digital Economy and Society, Thailand.

loginNotice.title: AI-Assisted Analysis Notice
loginNotice.message: This system uses AI for analysis support. Final decisions must be made by qualified personnel. Users are responsible for validating all AI-generated results before making operational decisions.
loginNotice.compliance: Thailand AI Ethics Guidelines developed by the National Science and Technology Development Agency (NSTDA) and Digital Economy Promotion Agency (DEPA), Ministry of Digital Economy and Society, Thailand.
